---
title: "upGMT"
---


```
upGMT(up=false)
```

Check if a new GMT (C binaries) version is available. If yes, use `upGMT(true)` to update it.



```{julia}
#| echo: false
#| output: asis
using GMT
GMT.doc_source_links("upGMT")
```
